column4: You can download opera source and compile it against the libs you've already got.
no you can't forget that I even wrote that. :)
I know you can. anyway.. topic is dead.. blah

However that is a problem you will face in linux for some while as the ilbs are changing quite often and compiling new versions of them against every possible combination of libs is more tedious (and people would get more confused as to which version they need) than compiling them statically.
